name: Duty madness - LudumDare42
description:
In this game you need to serve foods to people's as the theme running out of space .. take care of people they gathering in yard if there are 5 people you will lose.. and dont pick up wrong foods you can not drop food in ground after picking it up..only can serve them good luck!!    

controls:-

Movements-  WASD

Running-  LeftShift

PickUp -   MouseClick  (after going near to place where foods are)
